name: Day 1898
description:
Made for Extra Credits-3 Game Jam

You are lost on an unknown planet. But will anyone come for you?

COMMANDS: (all small letters)

command: show (shows current stats)

parameter: power, food, temp, shield

command: scan (scans for issues)

parameter: none

command: check (checks the area for issue)

parameters: power, food, temp, shield

command: repair (repairs the issue)

parameter: {FATAL CODE}

command: suspend (will work only after repairing everything)

parameter: none

command: msg (broadcast messages outside)

parameter: none

'suspend' command lets you sleep and progress in the game
